#ifndef SCALARS_H
#define SCALARS_H
#define SCALARS_SPEC \
"struct scalars { \
	short aShort; \
	unsigned short aUshort; \
	long aLong; \
	unsigned long aUlong; \
	char aChar; \
	octet aOctet; \
	float aFloat; \
	double aDouble; \
};"
typedef struct scalars_st {
	short aShort; /*- sort scalar -*/
	unsigned short aUshort; /*- unsigned sort scalar -*/
	long aLong; /*- long scalar -*/
	unsigned long aUlong; /*- unsigned long scalar -*/
	char aChar; /*- char scalar -*/
	unsigned char aOctet; /*- unsigned char scalar -*/
	float aFloat; /*- float scalar -*/
	double aDouble; /*- double scalar -*/
} SCALARS_ST;
#endif /* SCALARS_H */
